Statistics.Main industries: mining, smelting, petroleum, food and beverages, tobacco, handicrafts, clothing, jewelry

External.Main export partners: Brazil 17.9% | Argentina 16% | United States 7.8% | Japan 7.3% | India 6.6% | South Korea 6.3% | Colombia 5.8% | China 5.1% | United Arab Emirates 4.7% | (2017)
External.Import goods: machinery, petroleum products, vehicles, iron and steel, plastics
External.Main import partners: China 21.7% | Brazil 16.8% | Argentina 12.6% | United States 8.4% | Peru 6.5% | (2017)
